action.content:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

peaceful

Related words are:

- pacifistic
- nonviolent
- quiet

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!

CLUE: This term describes a person or behavior that avoids conflict and violence, often associated with a strong belief in resolving disputes without aggression. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

this term describes a person or behavior that avoids conflict and violence often associated with a strong belief in resolving disputes without aggression guesses from the other player will start with guessend

You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to guess a target word that another player describes to you.

You can make one guess at each trial. You win when you guess the target word. You lose when you cannot guess it in 3 tries.

After each trial you will get a new hint from the other player which starts with CLUE.

Make your guesses by just saying the word using the following form: GUESS: <a word>

Let us start.


CLUE: This term describes a person or behavior that avoids conflict and violence, often associated with a strong belief in resolving disputes without aggression. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

CLUE: This adjective characterizes a state or situation where there is no disturbance, aggression, or conflict, often implying a sense of calm and tranquility. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

this adjective characterizes a state or situation where there is no disturbance aggression or conflict often implying a sense of calm and tranquility guesses from the other player will start with guessend

CLUE: This adjective characterizes a state or situation where there is no disturbance, aggression, or conflict, often implying a sense of calm and tranquility. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>

CLUE: This word conveys a deep sense of calm and untroubled peace, often used to describe a scene or a person's demeanor that is free from any disturbance or turmoil. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.<|end|>
Target word 'peaceful' (stem=peac) is similar to clue word 'peace' (stem=peac)
